text: avarkalukku ninaivuttappatta narpotanaikalai avarkal marantuvitta potu, avarkalukku (mutalil) ellap porutkalin vayilkalaiyum nam tirantu vittom - pinnar, avarkalukku kotukkappattataik kontu avarkal makilcciyataintu kontirunta velai (nam vetanaiyaik kontu) avarkalai titirenap pitittuk kontom; appotu avarkal nampikkai ilantavarkalaka akivittanar
